pronunciation.pinyin: dà dōng yà gòng róng quān
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: Da4 Dong1 ya4 Gong4 rong2 quan1

meanings.value: Great East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere, Japanese wartime slogan for their short-lived Pacific Empire, first enunciated by Prime Minister Prince KONOE Fumimaro 近衛文麿|近卫文麿 in 1938
